responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "4E0ED42C4252D44B66919784838B0359", "Besides having an unnecessarily long name, The Church of Divine Justice, devoted to Aldric the Divine Arbiter, focuses on morality, justice, and order. It enforces divine laws through the Celestial Court, determining rewards and punishments based on merit. Traditions include prayers for the accused and events like Amnesty Day and the Festival of Justice.")
name: DD_CSQ_0090_Alysandra_7_Response
